summary:
Features, Full Physics and non-physic option, Fit this outfit perfectly to all UNP bodies, all Sevenbase, all UNPB, Demonphet, Seraphim, Top Model, DG, and many many more. In just seconds you can have the body type you want!
Everybody, Everytime, and Everywhere in game with Racemenu Morph Support
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399708924.png[/img]
[size=2]photo by DeserterX
[/size][center][size=2][b][size=5]Wild Huntress UUNP Slider [/size][/b]

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494][u][color=#0066cc]Wild Huntress UNP Top ...[/color][/u][/url] was designed and textured by "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Nsk13[/size][/color][/u][/url][b]"

The meshes here are Re-Mastered by "[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][b]" to give the end-user a form fitting outfit for all body types in the UUNP System.

Tools used by "[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc]gamefever[/color][/u][/url] [b]"
[/b][color=#0066cc][size=3]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/size][/color][b] by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Caliente[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]and [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Ousnius[/size][/color][/u][/url]
[b]Blender
Nifskope
Meshrigger


[/b][/center][size=4][b][u]
Features
[/u][/b][/size]Fit them to any UNP variant, UNPB variant, Sevenbase variant, Demonfet, Saraphim, Top Model, Dream Girl, Venus....50 bodies all perfectly everytime each time.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69758-1-1442448347.jpg[/img]

Full Physics Weight Painting and Non-Physics Options
No Clipping
Skin Tight Leggings, Hosery, and Undies
Racemenu Morph Support
Make any type of UNP body variant in seconds without any fuss.
Slide the outfits to fit any UNP body in  Bodyslide or Slide it in real time in game with Racemenu Morphs Pluggin
Slide your favorite outfit today with total confidence that it will work everytime with a Gamefever UUNP slider.
All Gamefever Sliders support pregnancy mods such as but not limited to "Being Female"
[size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]Requirements
[/u][/size][size=3]Bodyslide Outfit Studio 2.0 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/size][/u][/url][size=3]?[/size]
[size=3]XPMS Extended (for Morph menu in game and skeleton of course) [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/][u][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/size][/u][/url][size=3]?
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?][i][u][size=4]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/size][/u][/i][/url]

[size=4][b][u]Suggested Mods
[/u][/b]Racemenu  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][u][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/[/size][/u][/url][size=3]?
[/size]Physics XML (in Files under options, has enabled femalehead.nif no more havoc object for you my friend)

[b][u]Installation
[/u][/b]Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573][u]Nsk13[/u][/url]'s original mod here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494/][u][color=#0066cc][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494/[/b][/color][/u][/url][b]?
[/b]
[/size][size=4][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69758-2-1442448347.jpg[/img]
[/size][size=3]
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
[/size][color=#fdeada][size=4][i]Original armor models by [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation by brokefoot[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#fdeada][size=4][i]Top Model body conversion [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52015/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]Brokefoots UNP Mashup for UNP Top Model body with TBBP by Chitlin[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#fdeada][size=4][i]Boots model [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP HDT REQUIRED by Beazalbob69[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#fdeada][size=4][i]Thank you guys for the permissions and the amazing work you did in the first place!

And of course [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url][color=#fdeada][size=4][i] for the original UNP body.

[/i][/size][/color][b]Want more sliders by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][b][color=#0066cc]Gamefever[/color][/b][/u][/url][b]? Go here
